Package mcm.graphics

Class Summary
Body Bodys are used to draw shapes to a graphics context.
DirectionShape An elliptical shape that shows its orientation.
Drawable A Drawable provides a double buffered drawing area.
EllipseShape An ellipse shape.
FillableShape FillableShapes wrap awt shapes that may be rendered by draw or fill calls.
ImageShape ImageShape objects wrap an ImageIcon.
LineShape A line shape.
Point Point is a wrapper for the Point2D.Double class.
RectangleShape A rectangle shape.
Shape Shape is the base class of all shapes used in mcm.graphics.
SizedShape SizedShapes wrap awt shapes that may be rendered by draw calls.
TextShape TextShapes serve to display one line Strings
TriangleShape An triangle shape.
